name: A Curious Pastime
description:
You are a young male/female/both/neither/other/undecided person of the Fir Cruthen, the mightiest (and drunkenest) nation in the Warhost.

You've ventured forth to make a name for yourself. You'll do this by completing an increasingly arbitrary, never ending, serious of inane puzzles; given to you by a colourful cast of characters doing terrible Scottish accents.

Will you be able to rise above the status of Background Noob and earn a name for yourself? Unlikely, you'll probably be dead before the weekend's over

A Curious Pastime is a comedy point and click adventure game that parodies the UK larp system "Curious Pastimes" and the characters there of - Minor swearing and violence, images and text of a sexual nature.  Hope you enjoy :)

Please Note: This game is not finished - but I've been working on it a year and my work schedule is getting busier, rather than see all the work I put in be forever lost I have uploaded the game as is - I have every intention of one day finishing it but... well just don't hold your breath.
